org.spongepowered.api.text.serializer

Interface FormattingCodeTextSerializer

  • All Superinterfaces:
    CatalogType, SafeTextSerializer, TextSerializer

    public interface FormattingCodeTextSerializer
extends SafeTextSerializer
    Represents a TextSerializer for the old "formatting code" strings. A formatted message consists out of plain text with a special character indicating a formatting follows and a unique character for each formatting.

    Example: &cHello &eSponge!
    With the special character & this would represent a red and yellow message. (With c, and e being the formatting characters.)

    See Also:
    Formatting codes on the Minecraft Wiki

      • replaceCodes

        String replaceCodes(String text,
                    char to)
        Replaces the formatting codes in the specified string with a different specified character, e.g. &cHello &eSponge! -> $cHello $eSponge!
        Parameters:
        text - The string to replace the formatting codes in
        to - The special character to replace with
        Returns:
        The replaced text

      • replaceCodes

        Parameters:
